### Error querying database.  Cause: java.sql.SQLSyntaxErrorException: Unknown column 'username' in 'field list'

### The error may involve defaultParameterMap

### SQL: SELECT  id,nick_name,qq,balance,bank,experience,username,name,password,phone,type,status,create_time,create_user  FROM gms_user

; bad SQL grammar []; nested exception is java.sql.SQLSyntaxErrorException: Unknown column 'username' in 'field list']
